feed.title: Giuliano Forghieri
feed.subtitle: A website about crafting my life with the help of technology, engineering but mostly common sense.

entry.title: Hello World!
entry.content:
Hi Everybody!

This is my first step into this wonderful world of blogging and this is my first blog! I hope my stay here will be joyful and I’ll be able to share my thoughts with all you wonderful people out there. I haven’t yet thought out yet what I’ll be focusing upon on this blog. Hopefully, I’ll do it soon.

Thanks and wish me luck!
